title: uru tuNaiyAi udavum
sahitya:
uru tuNaiyAi udavum murugan tirunAmam urudiyAi adanai nI karudinAl manamE


anupallavi

  vaghuttamurum pOdu vADip-padarum pOdu karuttai oru nilaiyil nirutti dhyAnittAl


caraNam    tIdellAm tolaiyum tirunAamam OdinAl nAthan murugan tiru pAda prasAdattAl
shOdanai vanda pOdum vEdanai koDukkAdu bAdhaka bandha vinai Edum unaikkeDukkAdu
